Articles.Content:
To describe the problem with a screenshot:

![zxUp92H.png](http://i.imgur.com/zxUp92H.png)

A lot of this text is unreadable, which is especially problematic if you need to read a deltav number or something else that happens to be important. As well, the ellipses doesn't really help because yes there is additional text but I can't read it without finding the right screen angle.

I think map user interface could use some pop up boxes for this type of text, to make sure it never overlaps.
Yep hoping new UI will help Squad sort this out.
